backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing access control, user profiles, article CRUD with admin permissions, and admission request handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing contact page updates and associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions using OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, manifest link, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, and startup configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining public and admin routes with layout and profile modal integration.
Wrapper component that restricts access to admin routes based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to submit their name and email.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the overall page layout with header, navigation, content area, and footer for the site.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Implements responsive primary navigation with admin-aware links and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminArticle: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations and publish toggling for admin-managed articles.
Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/admissions/useAdmissi: Fetches all admission requests and provides a mutation to delete individual requests.
frontend/src/hooks/admissions/useSubmitA: Provides a mutation to submit a new admission request to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/articles/useArticleBy: Fetches a single article by its ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/articles/usePublished: Fetches all published articles from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity state and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity restoration via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks to get and update the caller's user profile using React Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminAdmissions: Displays and manages admission requests, including loading state, listing entries, and archiving them via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminArticlesPa: Provides full CRUD and publish/unpublish controls for articles with dialogs for create and edit operations.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows admin navigation cards linking to article management and admission request pages.
frontend/src/pages/Admissions/Admissions: Renders a student admission form, handles submission, and shows a confirmation screen after success.
frontend/src/pages/Articles/ArticleDetai: Fetches and displays a single published article with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/Articles/ArticlesList: Lists all published articles with loading and error handling and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/Contact/ContactPage.t: Renders a contact page with WhatsApp, phone, email, address, and social links plus clipboard copy actions and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Home/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero banner, feature cards, and navigation buttons for admissions and articles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash fragments, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, colors, fonts, container behavior, animations, and plugins.
